WYSIWYM.model
Class TextPlan

java.lang.Object
  WYSIWYM.model.TextPlan
Direct Known Subclasses:
QueryPlan, QueryResultPlan
public class TextPlan
extends Object

TextPlan represents a conceptual plan of the feedback text and holds DependencyTrees. TextPlan and TextPlanner are older versions of the planning algorithm; for aggregation, use ContentPlan and ContentPlanner.

Version:
1.2 2007/12/6
Author:
Feikje Hielkema

Nested Class Summary
protected  class TextPlan.Paragraph
          Helper class, contains all dependency trees in a paragraph, divided into sentence sets
protected  class TextPlan.SentenceSet
          Helper class, contains dependency trees in a sentence set; meaning, a group of dependency trees without line breaks between them

protected  List<String> keys
          Paragraph headers
protected  Map<String,TextPlan.Paragraph> plan
          Paragraphs, with their headers as key
protected  List<DependencyTree> treeList
          All Dependency Trees in the text plan

                String p,

Adds a dependency tree to the given paragraph/sentence set

Parameters:
tree - DependencyTree to be added

Throws:
TextPlanningException - if the paragraph or sentence set does not exist

newParagraph

public boolean newParagraph(String head,
                            Anchor anchor)
Creates a new paragraph with the given header

Parameters:
head - String with the header of the new paragraph
anchor - The Anchor attached to the header (may be null)
Returns:
false if the text already has a paragraph with this header

newParagraph

public String newParagraph(List<AnchorString> head)
Creates a new paragraph with the given header. If there already is a paragraph with this header, the new header is changed.

Parameters:
head - List with the header of the new paragraph
Returns:
String with the header of the paragraph

newSet

public boolean newSet(String paragraph,
                      String header)
Creates a new (paragraph and) sentence set with the given headers. If there already is a sentence set in that paragraph with that header, return false.

Parameters:
paragraph - String with the header of the paragraph
header - String with the header of the sentence set
Returns:
false if the paragraph already has a sentence set with this header
